thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 42 of 227
thread.title: Norma P.
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Norma P.

author: Norma P.
title: Norma P.
text:
My Sales rep was very professional and he allowed me to make my decision on which furniture I wanted to purchase without being pushy. The delivery team was on time, quick and very nice. They placed everything where I wanted it and they cleaned up behind themselves.
Thanks, Gardner White!!!
